title: Best Keen music
content: Which game has the best Keen Music in your opinion?

title: hmm...
content:
Keen4's good: Uh... Slug Village
Keen4's bad: Pyramids, Miragia.
Keen4 overall: barf

Keen5's good: Brownian Motion Inducer
Keen5's bad: Security Center
Keen5's overall: good

Keen6's good: Guard Post(s), Dome(s).
Keen6's bad: Bloogton Tower
Keen6's overall: excellent

Voted Keen6.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: hmm...
content: Hmmm, this one's hard.. But most I probably like Keen 5 music. I'll vote that.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

content:

title: Re: hmm...
content: Keen 6 has the most good songs, tough Keen 4 has the single music whose the most famous and loved and best - Eat your Veggies! (Ti ti ti ti ti TI! ti tiiiiiiiiii...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pogo.gif[/img] )Couldn't he just use the pogo!?

title: Re: Best Keen music
content:
Ok, here's what I think:

Keen 4 does have some good music, but there are just four songs (excluding the map one), and they are not so great. Keen 5, in my opinion, has the best music. I don't consider any of it's songs to be bad. Keen 6 has many good songs too, but I still prefer the fifith game's music. So, I vote on Keen 5.

title: Re: Best Keen music
content:
Keen 4 has some nice stuff, but like already mentioned above, they simply repeat too often, both because there aren't that many, and because some of them are really short.

That leave Keen 5 and 6, and my gut felt like "5" first, so I voted that one.
Truth be told I have a thing for part 6... along with the game as a whole I have to reach the conclusion I mostly think they are different, not better or worse than the other.
Then again, I think I'm tone-deaf, I know I know next to nothing about music, so my opinion doesn't count for much.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten.

content:
I love Keen 4 out of sheer nostolgia, otherwise, Keen 5

title: Re: Best Keen music
content:
Keen6 is the best because of ONE and ONLY ONE reason: the Bloogton Mfg., Inc. background music! Well, Bloogbase Rec./Management Districts music is also good, I can't stand Bloogton tower/BASA/Blooglab music, and Control Center music simply rocks.

Although the only Keen song I keep imitating while walking is Keen5 L13 (Korath III base).------------------

content:

title: Re: Best Keen music
content:
Keen 6 has the best. Keen 4's music is fine, in my opinion, but, as others have said, it is just not varied enough. Keen 5 has nice music, but it doesn't impress me the way Keen 6's music does.

Bloogton Mfg. must have the best music in the Keen series. If for no other reason than that it fits its level so well. The Bloogbase music is super awesome also, and one doesn't really care so much that it's very short. The Domes of Darkness and Guard Posts have the kind of mellow (?) music that stands in good contrast to the more energetic music of other levels. (The Bloogton Tower music, I must agree, is rather weak, if not annoying.)
